test

Class Randoms

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.Randoms

  • public class Randoms
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate the random number:
    This class have 2 return type to use.
    1. return as array of integer.
    2. return as input stream (you can use it to Game class).
    Since:
    Sat 25/Feb/2017 - 2:59 AM
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    kamontat

      get array that contains of all random number with length size and all number is in length (1to max) both inclusive.

      • writeToFile

        private static void writeToFile(int[] randoms)
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        write the random integer array into file.
        Parameters:
        randoms - the random numbers array.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when program can't create the file.

      • getRandomIntArray

        public static int[] getRandomIntArray(int size,
                                      int max)
        get array that contains of all random number with length size and all number is in length (1to max) both inclusive.
        Parameters:
        size - the array size
        max - the maximum number (inclusive)
        Returns:
        the randoms array.

      • getRandomInputStream

        public static java.io.InputStream getRandomInputStream(int size,
                                                       int max)
        get random number size size with in length (1 to max) both inclusive.
        Parameters:
        size - the input size
        max - the maximum of number (inclusive) inside input stream
        Returns:
        input stream of randoms
        See Also:
        BufferedReader, Scanner

      • removeTempFile

        public static void removeTempFile()
        remove the generate randoms file
